description: This source file implements authentication state management for a Flutter app, including login, registration, token handling, and state notification via Riverpod.

classes.name: AuthState
classes.description: Represents the authentication state, including token, loading status, errors, and authentication status.

classes.name: AuthNotifier
classes.description: Manages the authentication state, performs login, registration, token load, and logout operations.

methods.name: AuthState.initial
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates an initial unauthenticated state.

methods.name: AuthState.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the current AuthState with optional new field values.

methods.name: AuthNotifier._loadToken
methods.description: Loads stored token on initialization and updates authentication state accordingly.

methods.name: AuthNotifier.login
methods.description: Performs user login via backend API, stores token if successful, and updates auth state.

methods.name: AuthNotifier.register
methods.description: Registers a new user with backend API, then auto-logs in if registration is successful.

methods.name: AuthNotifier.logout
methods.description: Logs out the user by deleting the stored token and resetting auth state.
